scripts.test: npm run test:deps && npm run test:start && npm run mocha && npm run stop
scripts.testWithCoverage: npm run test:deps && nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text --all --include 'src/main/**' --exclude 'node_modules/**' --exclude 'src/main/webapp/**' npm run test:mocha
scripts.dev: npm run dev:deps && npm run dev:nodemon
scripts.dev:docker: npm run dev:deps && npm run dev:nodemon:docker
scripts.dev:https: npm run dev:deps && export HTTPS=true|| set HTTPS=true&& npm run dev:nodemon
scripts.dev:clientSideCertificates: npm run dev:deps && export HTTPS=true|| set HTTPS=true&& export HTTP2=false|| set HTTP2=false&& export HTTPS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=false|| set HTTPS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=false&& export REQUEST_CLIENT_SIDE_CERTIFICATE=true|| set REQUEST_CLIENT_SIDE_CERTIFICATE=true&& npm run dev:nodemon
scripts.dev:jwt: npm run dev:deps && export CASS_JWT_ENABLED=true|| set CASS_JWT_ENABLED=true&& npm run dev:nodemon
scripts.dev:oidc: npm run dev:oidcdeps && export CASS_OIDC_ENABLED=true|| set CASS_OIDC_ENABLED=true&& npm run dev:nodemon
scripts.dev:node: export CASS_LOOPBACK=http://localhost:8080/api/|| set CASS_LOOPBACK=http://localhost:8080/api/&&export PORT=8080|| set PORT=8080&&node src/main/server.js
scripts.mochaNyc: export CASS_LOOPBACK=http://localhost:8080/api/|| set CASS_LOOPBACK=http://localhost:8080/api/&&wait-on http://localhost:8080/api/ping && mocha -b --timeout 15000 src/**/*.test.js node_modules/cassproject/src/**/*.test.js && wait-on http://localhost:8080/api/kill
scripts.autonyc: npm run dev:deps && nodemon --watch ../cass-npm --watch . --exec "npm run run:nyc"
scripts.run:nyc: export CASS_LOOPBACK=http://localhost:8080/api/|| set CASS_LOOPBACK=http://localhost:8080/api/&&export PORT=8080|| set PORT=8080&&export KILL=true|| set KILL=true&&concurrently "nyc --reporter=lcov npm run dev:node" "npm run mochaNyc"
scripts.run:withTests: npm run test:start & npm run mochaEncryption
scripts.openapi:validate: npm install -g @apidevtools/swagger-cli && wait-on http://localhost/api/swagger.json && curl -o swaggerx.json http://localhost/api/swagger.json && swagger-cli validate swaggerx.json
scripts.openapi:justValidate: wait-on http://localhost/api/swagger.json && curl -o swaggerx.json http://localhost/api/swagger.json && swagger-cli validate swaggerx.json && del swaggerx.json
scripts.buildRun:kill: docker kill cass-test | exit 0 && docker rm cass-test | exit 0
scripts.buildRun:ubuntu16: npm run buildRun:kill && docker build --progress plain -f docker/test/ubuntu-16.04-latest/Dockerfile -t cass-test . && docker run -p80:80 --name cass-test cass-test
scripts.buildRun:ubuntu18: npm run buildRun:kill && docker build --progress plain -f docker/test/ubuntu-18.04-latest/Dockerfile -t cass-test . && docker run -p80:80 --name cass-test cass-test
scripts.buildRun:ubuntu20: npm run buildRun:kill && docker build --progress plain -f docker/test/ubuntu-20.04-latest/Dockerfile -t cass-test . && docker run -p80:80 --name cass-test cass-test
scripts.buildRun:ubuntu18:13to15: npm run buildRun:kill && docker build --progress plain -f docker/test/ubuntu-18.04-latest/Dockerfile-13to15 -t cass-test . && docker run -p80:80 --name cass-test cass-test
scripts.buildRun:standaloneWindowsFips: npm run buildRun:kill && docker build --pull --no-cache --progress plain -f docker/fips/Dockerfile -t cass-test . && docker run -p80:80 --name cass-test cass-test
scripts.buildRun:standaloneTest: npm run buildRun:kill && docker build --pull --no-cache --progress plain -f docker/standalone/Dockerfile -t cass-test . && docker run -p80:80 -p9200:9200 --name cass-test cass-test
scripts.buildRun:standalone: npm run buildRun:kill && docker build --pull --no-cache --progress plain -f docker/standalone/Dockerfile -t cass-test . && docker run -p80:80 --name cass-test cass-test
scripts.buildRun:standaloneNode: npm run buildRun:kill && docker build --pull --no-cache --progress plain -f docker/standalone/node/Dockerfile -t cass-test . && docker run -p80:80 --name cass-test cass-test
scripts.buildRun:test: npm run buildRun:kill && docker build --progress plain -f docker/test/Dockerfile -t cass-test . && docker run --network esnet -p80:80 --name cass-test cass-test
scripts.buildRun:testReplication: npm run buildRun:kill && docker build --progress plain -f docker/test/replication/Dockerfile -t cass-test . && docker run -p80:80 --name cass-test cass-test
scripts.buildRun:testProxy: npm run buildRun:kill && docker build --progress plain -f docker/test/proxy/Dockerfile -t cass-test . && docker run -p80:80 --name cass-test cass-test
